name: EFSF Deflected Shields
desc: MS replacement rate does not go down when MS are lost.
short: MS replacement rate does not go down.

name: Sieg Zeon
desc: Ship's crews are bolstered in patriotism, lowering the replacement time of fighters by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. The morale boost also makes the ship require less crew to operate, lowering skeleton crew requirement by %s.

name: Shield
desc:
The Torment has an auxiliary reactor that grants an additional shield, but can be attacked and destroyed during combat, which shuts down the secondary shield and reduces flux dissipation and capacity by %s percent.

The secondary shield has %s capacity, %s dissipation and has a %s efficiency.

The reactor and its shield are affected by the Torment captain's skills, but not by any hullmods applied to the Torment itself.
short: Severe reduction in combat capability if generator is destroyed.

desc: Variesties of weapons to choose from.
Variesties of weapons to choose from.

name: AI Learning Module
desc: Every %s your maximum spread reduces by %s.
short: Every %s your maximum spread reduces by %s.

name: Sniper Module
desc: Increases weapon range by %s. Every %s for %s you do %s more damage.
short: Increases weapon range by %s. Every %s for %s you do %s more damage.

name: Leg Trusters
desc: Increase acceleration by %s and turn speed by %s.
short: Increase acceleration by %s and turn speed by %s.
